results.name: Periodic sequence: Repeat 57, 71.
comment: Inverse binomial transform of 57 followed by 128*A000079.
Third inverse binomial transform of A176635.
xref: Cf. A000079 (powers of 2), A176635, A176713 (decimal expansion of (4047+sqrt(16394397))/142).
